name: Shreyas Chate
title: Conversational AI Engineer
summary: Conversational AI engineer crafting intelligent systems that transform how people interact with technology. Through ServiceNow, LangChain, and agentic workflows, I build solutions that don't just work, they understand, adapt, and deliver exceptional experiences.
background: I bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI technology and real-world human needs. My work at Capital Group transformed how 40,000+ employees interact with IT support, turning complex systems into intuitive conversations that actually solve problems. I've built this across Fortune 500 companies, universities, and startups, always with one goal: making technology work for people, not the other way around.

masters.degree: Masters of Science in Computer Science
courses: COMPSCI 790 - Advanced Topics in Computer Science (Introduction to Research Computing)
COMPSCI 790 - Advanced Topics in Computer Science (Immersive Technologies and 3D User Interfaces)

bachelors.degree: Bachelors of Engineering in Information Technology
courses: 214445 - Problem Solving and Object Oriented Programming
314454 - Data Science and Big Data Analytics

experience.title: Chatbot & Conversational AI Engineer
experience.description: Led the technical migration of 40,000+ employees to ServiceNow Agent Chat, establishing robust data governance and reporting frameworks that ensured zero-downtime deployment. Designed and implemented conversational AI journeys that increased intent recognition accuracy by 35%, enabling self-service for thousands of support requests daily. Architected production-grade LangChain and LangGraph RAG pipelines with automated CI/CD workflows, reducing support ticket resolution time by 40% while maintaining 99.9% uptime.
key_achievements: Led migration of 40,000+ employees to ServiceNow Agent Chat with zero downtime
Increased intent recognition accuracy by 35% through NLU and retrieval tuning
Reduced support ticket resolution time by 40%
Built automated CI/CD pipelines for conversational AI systems

experience.title: Information Technology Consultant
experience.description: Transformed IT help desk operations by redesigning knowledge base systems and implementing automated workflows, reducing MFA-related resolution time by 30% and improving student satisfaction scores. Built a production-ready React and Node.js chatbot with MariaDB backend that handled 40% of all student support inquiries.
key_achievements: Built chatbot that handled 40% of all student support inquiries
Partnered with Azure teams for secure user data integration

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed a reusable React and Redux component library that accelerated feature delivery across multiple product teams, reducing development time by 25% for new features. Optimized API integrations and S3 asset delivery, resulting in 30% faster page load times.
key_achievements: Reduced development time by 25% for new features
Established Agile practices and testing frameworks

experience.title: Software Developer Intern/Co-op
experience.description: Built cross-platform React Native applications with sophisticated animations and lazy loading, achieving 60fps performance and seamless user experiences across iOS and Android. Established comprehensive Jest testing coverage and performance optimization practices that reduced post-deployment bugs by 25%.
key_achievements: Achieved 60fps performance in React Native apps

major_projects.name: Enterprise Conversational Platform
major_projects.description: Architected and led the migration of 40,000+ employees to a next-generation conversational AI platform, transforming how an entire organization interacts with IT support through intelligent automation.
highlights: 35% boost in accurate intent resolution through NLU & retrieval tuning
Unified live agent + virtual agent journeys with custom UI and governance dashboards
Automated release pipelines and observability for AI-assisted workflows

major_projects.name: UWM Helpdesk Intelligence Hub
major_projects.description: Built an intelligent support system that revolutionized student IT services, combining cutting-edge chatbot technology with intuitive design to dramatically improve response times and user satisfaction.
highlights: Replaced 40% of traditional ticket volume with conversational support
Mentored Level 1 consultants with playbooks, training loops, and QA dashboards
Partnered with Azure & identity teams to connect user data with secure escalation paths
major_projects.impact: Handled 40% of all student support inquiries

major_projects.name: Volkswagen Digital Operations Suite
major_projects.description: Built component-driven React platforms and Node microservices powering internal VW workflows, with CI/CD, observability, and S3 optimizations for global teams.
highlights: Reusable design system accelerated feature delivery across product squads
REST & GraphQL integration with automation improved deployment reliability
Strategic media optimization improved asset load time by 30%

major_projects.name: AntHill CO₂ Intelligence
major_projects.description: Led the team that won Best Overall Hack for an ML-powered dashboard visualizing real-time CO₂ emissions for architecture firms.
highlights: End-to-end prototype in 24 hours combining real-time datasets, forecasting, and narrative visuals
Crafted UX flows that make sustainability metrics actionable for execs and project teams
major_projects.award: Winner – Best Overall Hack at AEC+ Tech Innovate Hackathon 2025

major_projects.name: CIRCLES - Social Networking App
major_projects.description: A Social networking app which makes you engage and connect with all the people you have met in your lifetime!

major_projects.name: AngryBirds VR
major_projects.description: A Virtual Reality AngryBirds game using Unity 3D, Translational and Rotational movements, Locomotion technique and RayCasting ops.

major_projects.name: Image Processing for Snapshot Projection Optical Tomography
major_projects.description: Optimized the MATLAB Code for processing images used for background subtraction and median filter by writing code in C language. Reduced time consumption for processing 100,000 images.

major_projects.name: BigScreen - Movie App
major_projects.description: A movie app which buffers and renders all the latest movies using TheMovieDB API.

major_projects.name: FB Social Networking App
major_projects.description: A social networking clone and a chat application with live status updates.

major_projects.name: Twitter Sentiment Analysis for Ukraine Russia War
major_projects.description: This project detected sentiment for all twitter posts using latest kaggle dataset. Development done to get all the necessary EDA's based on location of the tweet to detect the type of sentiment and the location from which the particular tweet was posted.

major_projects.name: Amazon Shopify
major_projects.description: A hobby project to build the Shopping Website integrating authentication, and payment methods using stripe.

major_projects.name: Electricity Theft Detector
major_projects.description: A system that detects theft by recognizing patterns according to seasons. The deployed model can send automatic e-mail notification to electricity provider admin if theft is detected at user's place.

major_projects.name: Google Stock Price Prediction
major_projects.description: A deep learning backend, in which I analyzed 5 yr. dataset for prediction of stock prices of current year.

major_projects.name: Election Winner Predictor
major_projects.description: An academic project where a model was deployed to predict the election winner following the trends and people's preferences along the years in past.

major_projects.name: Face Mask Detector
major_projects.description: A Face mask detector system implemented at a local company to detect if the face mask is ON for safety and security purpose at the location. A basic monitoring system for security guards.

achievements.title: Winner – Best Overall Hack
achievements.description: AntHill CO₂ analysis platform combining LLM forecasting with action-ready dashboards for architecture teams.

achievements.title: Best Research Paper
achievements.description: Electricity Theft Detection using smart meter data, machine learning, and visual analytics.

personality: I'm passionate about making technology work for people. I combine deep technical expertise with a focus on user experience. Every line of code I write, every system I design, is measured by one metric: does it make someone's day better? I love solving complex problems and seeing the moment when technology becomes invisible, when a chatbot understands context, when automation feels natural.

likes: Building AI systems that actually help people
dislikes: Technology that doesn't consider user experience
Systems that are hard to maintain

goals: Continue pushing the boundaries of conversational AI
Build systems that make technology more accessible
Share knowledge through articles and mentorship
Work on projects that have meaningful impact
